channel.title: Rs2 server tutorials (inc. darknings noob tut)
channel.description:
i've been wondering, why has the rs2 server tutorials section been ruined. you used to be able to actually put a decent tutorial in there but now moderators/administrators have just made this forum shit.
:\.
